00001 from molDynamics.gulp.potentials.FourAtomPotential import FourAtomPotential
00002 from os import linesep
00003 
00004 class TorsionGulp(FourAtomPotential):
00005     '''representation of a three atom potential for gulp'''
00006     
00007     class Inventory(FourAtomPotential.Inventory):
00008         import pyre.inventory as inv
00009         kFit = inv.str("Fit k", default = None)
00010         kFit.meta['tip'] = "whether to change this parameter during a fitting run"
00011         kFit.validator = inv.choice([None, 'True', 'False'])
00012 
00013                 
00014     def __init__(self, atom1, atom2, atom3, atom4):
00015         FourAtomPotential.__init__(self, atom1, atom2, atom3, atom4)
00016         self.ii=self.inventory
00017         self.ii.atom1 = atom1
00018         self.ii.atom2 = atom2
00019         self.ii.atom3 = atom3
00020         self.ii.atom4 = atom4
00021         
00022     def write(self):
00023         '''writes the potential out'''
00024         return "torsion "\
00025             + self.writeInterIntra()\
00026             + self.writeBonding()\
00027             + linesep\
00028             + self.ii.atom1+' '\
00029             + self.ii.atom1Type+' '\
00030             + self.ii.atom2+' '\
00031             + self.ii.atom2Type+' '\
00032             + self.ii.atom3+' '\
00033             + self.ii.atom3Type+' '\
00034             + self.ii.atom4+' '\
00035             + self.ii.atom4Type+' '\
00036             + str(self.potential["k"])+' '\
00037             + str(self.potential["isign"])+str(self.potential["n"])+' '\
00038             + str(self.potential["cutoff"][0])+' '\
00039             + str(self.potential["cutoff"][1])+' '\
00040             + str(self.potential["cutoff"][2])+' '\
00041             + str(self.potential["cutoff"][3])+' '\
00042             + self.getFlag(self.ii.kFit)\
00043             + linesep
